sentences: Christian Joseph Morata Bautista (born October 19, 1981) is a Filipino singer, actor, host, and model.
He was a finalist of Star in a Million, a Philippine reality show aired on ABS-CBN channel, winning 4th place in the competition in 2003.
After being with ABS-CBN for 10 years, Bautista transferred to GMA Network and signed a three-year exclusive contract on March 20, 2013.
